/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars can be seen in the distance, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
